ValidationRule.description: If Offer's Property Instructed is set to 'NO', Status is 'Exchanged', then Primary Seller / Landlord, Buyer Solicitor and Potential Buyer / Tenant, Seller Solicitor fields should not Blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name == 'UK', OR( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Completed'), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Exchanged') ) , OR( ISBLANK( Buyer_Contact__c ), ISBLANK( Seller_Contact__c ), ISBLANK( Buyer_Solicitor__c ), ISBLANK( Seller_Solicitor__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Mandatory to fill Buyer Contact, Buyer Solicitor, Seller Contact, Seller Solicitor, if Status is Exchanged or Completed.
